execution_quality: The agent successfully implemented the requested skeleton loading pattern by editing the relevant component files to show placeholders while data loads, but the implementation introduced a regression (a type error affecting chart functionality) that the user immediately encountered.
work_category: UI/UX enhancement to implement skeleton loading placeholders for an app list drawer that was experiencing slow initial load times.
summary: The agent correctly understood the user's request for skeleton loading placeholders and made focused edits to implement the feature. However, the implementation inadvertently broke unrelated chart functionality, suggesting the changes either had broader side effects or weren't properly tested before deployment. This represents a critical misalignment because while the skeleton loading feature may have been implemented correctly, the net result was a broken application rather than an improved user experience.
follow_up_pattern: User reported a breaking error in their app (chart broken due to type mismatch), requiring immediate debugging and rollback/fix of the skeleton loading changes.
